metadata.title: CVE-2024-27808 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin tvOS 17.5, visionOS 1.2, Safari 17.5, iOS 17.5 and iPadOS 17.5, watchOS10.5, macOS Sonoma 14.5. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
